body_html: One more thing I forget to say, I also add the option for computing sparsemax in case of 2 classes where only one logit value is available. This behavior is similar to sigmoid function. In this case, I assume that the logit for class 0 is 0 and the logit for class 1 is the logit itself.

body: One more thing I forget to say, I also add the option for computing sparsemax in case of 2 classes where only one logit value is available. This behavior is similar to sigmoid function. In this case, I assume that the logit for class 0 is 0 and the logit for class 1 is the logit itself.
